class TranslationTableModel &  ttm,
std::map< std::string, ExperimentResults * > &  er

RegressionExperimentReport::generate Synopsis:

Create the report this object was made for. This should be called once per experiment.

Parameters:
rte - the single instance run time environment.
ttm - the single instance of the translation table.
er - the container of all ExperimentGeneResults per experiment.
Returns:
true - when report was generated as expected.

std::string RegressionExperimentReport::getHaplotypeReportName ( const RunTimeEnvironment &  rte  ) 

RegressionExperimentReport::getHaplotypeReportName Synopsis:

Create the Haplotype regression file name from various constant and runtime environment settings. Unlike the Console reports created there is now ".tmp" version created.

Parameters:
rte - the single instance run time environment
Returns:
fileName - the name of the regression haplotype file

virtual ExperimentReportTypeEnum RegressionExperimentReport::report_type (  )  [inline, virtual]

ExperimentReport::report_type Synopsis:

Registering a new report requires adding an ENUM to the report type enum in this file. This method returns that ENUM specified.

Returns:
ExperimentReportTypeEnum - NULLREPORT by default.
